mapper.select:
select
from lorry_info inner join user_info on user_info.id_type=lorry_info.id_type and user_info.id_card=lorry_info.id_card where lorry_info.status=1 and user_info.user_id=#{userId} and lorry_info.default_flag=1;

select
from lorry_info inner join user_info on user_info.id_type=lorry_info.id_type and user_info.id_card=lorry_info.id_card where lorry_info.status!=0 and user_info.user_id=#{userId} order by lorry_info.weight desc limit 1;

select
from lorry_info inner join user_info on user_info.id_type=lorry_info.id_type and user_info.id_card=lorry_info.id_card where lorry_info.status!=0 and user_info.user_id=#{userId};

select lorry_info.id as lorryId, lorry_info.plate_number as plateNumber, lorry_info.carry_weight as carryWeight, lorry_info.default_flag as defaultSelect, lorry_info.unit_weight as unitWeight, lorry_info.over_carry_weight as overCarryWight, lorry_info.status as carStatus from lorry_info inner join user_info on user_info.id_type=lorry_info.id_type and user_info.id_card=lorry_info.id_card where lorry_info.status!=0 and user_info.user_id=#{userId};
